tidbits.title: Baltic Gem
tidbits.description: Latvia is a Baltic gem with a blend of vibrant cities, historic towns, and picturesque countryside adorned with lakes and dense forests.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country boasts a rich cultural heritage seen in its traditional festivals, folklore, wooden architecture, and vibrant arts scene.

tidbits.title: Riga - Art Nouveau Capital
tidbits.description: Riga, the capital, showcases an exquisite Art Nouveau architecture and a lively atmosphere with its markets, cafes, and cultural events.
